RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 56. Allowance Purse 25600. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 11, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RED HEAD KID anxious in paddock, broke well chased to stretch took over, clear off in a shrp effort. DASH OF FIRE no speed to the stretch, outside run in the lane for place. JIM'S RIVER RUNNER raced along in good position from inside, angled out lost place. FACTUM'S STAR quick speed to the front, dueled to the turn, weakened stretch. VEGAS PLAYER between horses early on with no response when needed.

ENTRY.NAME: Jim's River Runner
ENTRY.OWNER: Rankin Elizabeth Lavrich Nancy and Rankin Lindsey
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along in good position from inside, angled out lost place

ENTRY.NAME: Factum's Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick speed to the front, dueled to the turn, weakened stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Vegas Player
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses early on with no response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Red Head Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: anxious in paddock, broke well chased to stretch took over clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Rick D. Terrell & Shelly L. Terrell

ENTRY.NAME: Dash of Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the stretch, outside run in the lane for place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 74. Starter Allowance Purse 14400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since July 11, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ERV'S WENCH shuffled back from gate, saved ground to turn, rallied, widened in the final furlong. SUM KINDA PRETTY quick start, pace to turn, overtaken into stretch, best of rest. QUIET DAWN raced along evenly from off rail for the show spot. WHISKEY SIS scrubbed on from inside to the stretch with no late kick. YEGUITA QUEEN brief speed inside, gave way readily with little response.

ENTRY.NAME: Yeguita Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed inside, gave way readily with little response

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Sis
ENTRY.COMMENT: scrubbed on from inside to stretch with no late kick in

ENTRY.NAME: Erv's Wench
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled back from gate, saved ground to turn, rallied, widened

ENTRY.NAME: Quiet Dawn
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly from off rail for the show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Sum Kinda Pretty
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick start, pace to turn, overtaken into stretch, best of rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AUNT NELDA bit tardy at the start, saved ground to far turn veered in and slammed the rail at the eighth pole, regrouped to clear off in the final sixteenth while swerving in sharply again at the finish with the rider staying on in a gallant effort by both the rider and the horse. QUEEN OF ATLANTIS four wide first turn, rushed up to the half, all out no match. PLEDGULATIONS no speed to far turn, widest run into stretch for show spot. DOODLE DOO chased early from inside, could not keep up, faded stretch run. TRUISM dueled leader to the half with a steady fade in the stretch. SHORT ON THE SUGAR through early and gave way readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Doodle Doo
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early from inside, could not keep up, faded stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Truism
ENTRY.OWNER: Frankfort Park Farm LLC and Mamakos Jason
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled leader to the half with a steady fade in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Aunt Nelda
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit tardy start, saved ground to far turn swerved in slammed rail

ENTRY.NAME: Short On the Sugar
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early and gave way readily

ENTRY.NAME: Queen of Atlantis
ENTRY.COMMENT: four wide first turn, rushed up to the half, all out no match

ENTRY.NAME: Pledgulations
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn, widest run into stretch for show spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1 1/16M Turf CR: 78. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLYING HOUDINI tracking leader to far turn inside, angled out for clear run, responded well and rallied clear in the final furlong under good handling to the wire. POGOERIACH speed to the lead from inside to eighth pole, no match for winner. ICONICUS raced along evenly throughout for the show spot best of rest. RIDGERUNNER raced evenly from inside throughout with nothing in the stretch. ROENICK broke a bit tardy, never menaced throughout. CROWN OF FAVOR never threatened throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Flying Houdini
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracking leader to far turn inside, angled out, rallied clear

ENTRY.NAME: Ridgerunner
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced evenly from inside throughout with nothing in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Roenick
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke a bit tardy, never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Iconicus
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly throughout for the show spot best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Crown of Favor
ENTRY.COMMENT: never threatened throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Pogoeriach
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the lead from inside to eighth pole, no match for winner

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 61. Allowance Purse 26700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since July 11, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CASUAL ATTIRE settled in down the backstretch, steady run inside to the far turn with game effort in the final furlong to prevail in at the wire under solid handling. CONTROLLER good position three wide run far turn, led eighth pole, nailed. ROAD TO MUSIC CITY pressing pace off rail to far turn, dueled into stretch, gamely. HEIDI'S SINATRA raced evenly throughout from inside with no late response. PEDAL TO DA KETTLE raced back while showing little throughout. DANCE MOVES inside speed to the front battled on to far turn, gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Dance Moves
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front battled on to far turn, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Road to Music City
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressing pace off rail to far turn, dueled into stretch, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Controller
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Ella D Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position three wide run far turn, led eighth pole, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Heidi's Sinatra
ENTRY.OWNER: Eyerman, Lee J. and Molumby, John
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced evenly throughout from inside with no late response

ENTRY.NAME: Pedal to Da Kettle
ENTRY.OWNER: Barker Scott W and Barker Carol
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back while showing little throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Casual Attire
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled in down the backstretch, steady run inside, game effort

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 1 1/16M Turf CR: 91. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 17800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Ove r Since July 11, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than$ 15,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EPIMYTHIUM close up never far back saved ground, shuffled to far turn, re-rallied and edged off late under stout handling to the wire. DRIFTWOOD sent to the lead, stayed to stretch, battled hard no match. SMOKEY LEE close up off rail to far turn, stuck a head in front, weaken late. ROGUE ELEMENT raced along evenly while never a menace from quarter pole while vanned off following the race.. LEVEE PROUD tried to keep up early from inside first turn, gave way readily. WEEKENDER never factored throughout. Race 6 was hand timed due to a computer error.

ENTRY.NAME: Epimythium
ENTRY.OWNER: Meah Anna M and Kenney Dave
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up never far back saved ground, shuffled, edged off late

ENTRY.NAME: Rogue Element
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly while never a menace, vanned off after race

ENTRY.NAME: Levee Proud
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up early from inside first turn, gave way readily

ENTRY.NAME: Smokey Lee
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up off rail to far turn, stuck a head in front, weaken late

ENTRY.NAME: Weekender
ENTRY.COMMENT: never factored throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Driftwood
ENTRY.OWNER: O'Hara, Jr., Robert and Gower, Gwyneth
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent to the lead, stayed to stretch, battled hard no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHISPARRAJOS inside speed to turn confidently handled smacked twice well clear. MEXITEXAFORNIA quick from the gate, overtaken into turn, chased, no match. MOONLIGHT JOKER raced along evenly from inside while along for the show spot. HANDSHAKER tracked three wide to turn, backed up readily into stretch. FISH TAIL had a slow start from the gate always far back, never in the hunt.

ENTRY.NAME: Fish Tail
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow start from inside, faded back at all pole

ENTRY.NAME: Moonlight Joker
ENTRY.OWNER: Adams Patricia A and Sheltowee Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly from inside while along for the show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Chisparrajos
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to turn confidently handled smacked twice well clear

ENTRY.NAME: Mexitexafornia
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick from the gate, overtaken into turn, chased no match

ENTRY.NAME: Handshaker
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked three wide to turn, backed up readily into stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 5F Turf CR: 69. Claiming Purse 13600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 11, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Ho rses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GIN N SIN no speed to the turn saving ground, perfect trip up rail and cleared under good handling to the wire. OPTIMIZME slow into stride from outside, ran on stretch along for place. SLENDER BETSY speed to the front, stayed clear to stretch, gave in for show. ELLIE DELI raced along evenly with no late kick. HAPPYSECRET chased pace to the stretch from inside angled out, wilted late.

ENTRY.NAME: Slender Betsy
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, stayed clear to stretch, gave in for show

ENTRY.NAME: Happysecret
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to the stretch from inside angled out, wilted late

ENTRY.NAME: Ellie Deli
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Gin N Sin
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the turn saving ground, perfect trip up rail, cleared

ENTRY.NAME: Optimizme
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow into stride from outside, ran on stretch along for place
